Name: Stalked at Night
About the game: Your name is Bill, a man that had a car accident in the countryside in West Virginia.Usually your trip would go smoothly,but this time you decided not to use the highway and you went for a nearby countryside road.A few miles from the point where you left the highway,you see an abandoned industrial zone,probably used in the 80s. Later,you wake up from a car crash,not exactly knowing where you are.Before crashing you saw some big animal crossing the road,and then following you for a while.Right now your priorities are to get out of this place. Features Simple but enjoyable gameplay. Multiple endings. Big enviroment. Tense atmosphere of fear.
